name: UCL_BUNDLED_EPISODE
description: Information about the episodes related to a charge line.

columns.name: UCL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the charge line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LAST_UPDT_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant the bundled episode was updated on this charge line.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The bundled episode whose link is defined on this line

columns.name: LINK_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: This indicates whether this episode is linked to the universal charge line.

columns.name: LINK_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether it's a user-override or something different that set the link.

columns.name: LINK_USER_ID
columns.description: Indicates the user who set the episode status for theï¿½charge line.

columns.name: LINK_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
